projectGridLines.title: Electronic Design Automation (EDA) for Proteantecs’ solutions
projectGridLines.description:
Description: This involves testing the new world-class cutting-edge algorithms, developing automations for complex tasks and VLSI design analysis. The role will train the candidate for an in-depth analysis of VLSI design while exposing the person to writing complex code.

Skill sets: Knowledge on VLSI design, Algorithms & Data Structures

Traits expectation: Team player, communication skills

Expected learning: Industry standard tools usage, building automation around tools, testing Proteantecs’ tools.

Specific courses required for project execution: VLSI design, Algorithms and Data Structures, Python basics.
